attributes.action: Save The Grange School, Warmley, Bristol
attributes.additional_details:
Save the Grange School, Warmley, Bristol from merging with Kings Oak Academy, so that it remains a school and sports college in its own right, on the current site that it occupies.

We would like the Dept for Education to work with South Gloucestershire Council and find an Academy sponsor who is willing to keep the school separate from any others in the locality, and  fund a rebuilding programme on the current site and  build a new start of the art school in conjuction with the LA.
